sources.title: It's Your America (1945)
sources.description: EF-5 // An American soldier, during his combat career, realizes the greatness of his country and determines to assume his share of the responsibilities of good citizenship upon his return to civilian life.

metadata.Plot: This short--long rumored to have been directed by John Ford--was produced by the US government specifically for veterans returning home from World War II, showing them what their responsibilities as citizens were now that they were returning to civilian life.
metadata.Actors: Ernest Cossart, Preston Foster, Arthur Kennedy
